main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of a round object, similar in size to a coke bottle, descending near Roswell, New Mexico.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3.4 seconds,The object was first seen at an estimated 25 degrees elevation and disappeared below tree line to the east.,Description and duration of the sighting is typical of a meteor sighting.,There was no trail or smoke associated with the object at any point.,The sighting correlates with other meteor observations in the region around the same time.
sighted object: a round object, size of a coke bottle
